msg: Fix spurious stack trace printing to stderr (JENA-490)

author: jross
msg: QPID-5001: Copy edits to the dispatch content

author: stefan2
msg: On the fsfs-improvements branch:  Introduce an explicit data structure
that describes the shared file handle used for reading multiple reps
(e.g. as part of a delta chain).  Replace the previous "file + rev"
Later patches will even open that file on demand only, i.e. delay the
fopen until after all cache lookups failed.  For now, we will open the
file unconditionally.  Similarly, delay the detection of the txdelta
diff version until we need to actually read the first delta window.
(rep_state_t): use the new struct instead of a plain APR file handle;
(create_rep_state_body): update signature; fill shared file struct;
(get_cached_window): no seek here anymore, we'll do that on demand
(auto_read_diff_version): new utility function with code taken from
(read_delta_window): auto-detect diff version; update struct access
(get_contents: ditto; seek before access (had been deferred)
verify_rep_cache): update to using a single hint element
